taskbody.context: This procedure starts the service, serviced.

step.cmd: Log in to the master host .

step.info: To monitor progress, enter the following command: journalctl -flu serviced -o cat
step.stepresult: The serviced daemon invokes docker to pull its internal services images from Docker Hub. The browser and command-line interfaces are unavailable until the images are installed and the services are started. The process takes approximately 5-10 minutes. When the message Trying to discover my pool repeats, is ready for the next steps.

step.note: Perform this step only if you are installing a single-host deployment.
step.cmd: Add the master host to the default resource pool.

stepxmp.p: Replace Hostname-Or-IP with the hostname or IP address of the master host:
If you enter a hostname, all hosts in your cluster must be able to resolve the name, either through an entry in /etc/hosts, or through a nameserver on your network.
